akn:section.akn:heading: Personal suits for relief against discrimination in public education

akn:content.akn:p: § 2000c–8. Personal suits for relief against discrimination in public education Nothing in this subchapter shall affect adversely the right of any person to sue for or obtain relief in any court against discrimination in public education. (Pub. L. 88–352, title IV, § 409, July 2, 1964, 78 Stat. 249.)
